Game.Name: Power League (Japan) (All Star Version)
Game.plot: World Class Baseball is a Sports game, developed and published by Hudson,which was released in Japan in 1988.Cheat: Hidden TeamAt the Vs Mode or Edit Mode team selection screen, hold Select and press I to pick your team. If done right, you'll play as the Champs.Cheat: Hidden TeamAt the Open or Watch Mode, after choosing your Team and the CPU's Team, press Left or Right to change who pitches first.Cheat: Pennant Mode Apples PasswordsFrom the Main Menu select Pennant Mode.
